  // user ready

  always @(posedge up_clk) begin
    if ((rx_rst == 1'b1) || (rx_pll_locked == 1'b0)) begin
      rx_user_ready <= 4'd0;
    end else begin
      rx_user_ready <= {rx_user_ready[2:0], 1'b1};
    end
  end
